hero.title: Dog greetings from a special shelter, where the cycle of goodness and wool happens!
hero.about: We are Tails of dog shelter and canister therapy center from City of Goodness. All of us:
hero.CTA: We are looking for a home and help with an open heart

tailsHero.title: Our tails
tailsHero.text: Meet our four-legged heroes: each of them is looking for a home and waiting for your help. Learn more about our pets, choose who you want to help, or open your heart to a new friend

contactsBlock.free: Free from all numbers within Ukraine

heroAbout.title: Here, every animal finds shelter and help!
heroAbout.text: Welcome to our shelter. We provide temporary shelter, care and finding new, loving families for our four-legged friends.
heroAbout.goal: Our goal is to create a comfortable and safe environment for every animal, where they can feel warmth, attention and love.
heroAbout.goal_text: We have dogs of all breeds, sizes and personalities looking for a forever home. We work with volunteers and veterinary professionals to ensure that each dog receives the necessary medical care, vaccinations and appropriate grooming.
heroAbout.goal_text_bottom: Our adoption process is extremely simple. You can visit our shelter, meet our dogs, get to know their personalities and choose a new friend for your family. Every dog deserves a happy life, and we will help you find the one who will become your faithful companion.

thanksModal.title: Thank you for your donation!
thanksModal.info: Your help makes a huge value. Thanks to your contribution, we can continue to take care of our four-legged friends, providing them with the necessary care and a chance for a better life.
thanksModal.gratitude: Thank you from all our tailed friends!

adoption.title: Your heart is now bigger!
adoption.info: Thank you for preparing your open home and your soul for a new four-legged friend. Our Tails team can't wait to get in touch with you and help you find the perfect furry companion.
adoption.gratitude: We will call you soon to discuss the next steps and answer your questions.
